text:
@realDonaldTrump #DopeyDon Monday Implosion:

Asked China to help him get re-elected, asked Ukraine to dig dirt up on Biden, had Russia hack opponents 
#Barr & #Trump lied and mislead about #Berman firing. Trying to cover up #SDNY findings on Allies 
122K+Died, #COVID19 up Nationwide
